projjson.$comment: This document is copyright Even Rouault and PROJ contributors, 2019-2020, and subject to the MIT license. This file exists both in data/ and in schemas/vXXX/. Keep both in sync. And if changing the value of $id, change PROJJSON_CURRENT_VERSION accordingly in io.cpp

geodetic_crs.description: One and only one of datum and datum_ensemble must be provided

vertical_crs.description: One and only one of datum and datum_ensemble must be provided

description: Schema for OGCAPI records profile for GeoDCAT - defines all extra elements defined by GeoDCAT so that the JSON-LD context can map to GeoDCAT RDF
